= Introduction =

Whatever organization of resources you may choose, it helps to set standards for you and your project members. One possible organization is presented here.

== Details ==

Folder structure of MXML and ActionScript sources
{{{
com
 company
  <domain>
   controller
   helper
   model
   conversation
   test
   view
 MyAppInitializer
}}}
 * domain refers to your business entity such as *customer*,*order*,*account*
 * controller is the package for proxies to remote services
 * helper is a package for any helper classes related to this domain
 * model is a package for your DTO (data transfer object) of VO (value objects)
 * conversation is a package that holds all Conversation classes
 * test is the package where all Unit tests are defined
 * view is the package for all forms,dialogs and other visual components
 * MyAppInitializer is the class responsible to setting up the ApplicationContext
